text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Another purposely false tweet we have not done the most testing. but we do have the highest death toll because of your failure to prepare and take Covid19 seriously. Didn't you say there were 15 cases and soon it would be zero we now have over 100,000 dead your legacy.
